newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Spring/White Wheat - Bids down on MGE losses.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Spring/White Wheat - Bids down on MGE losses.

text.p: Dark northern spring wheat cash bids were lower on Monday, in line with a drop in MGE spring wheat futures, with very little movement noted, dealers said.

Farmer sales were virtually nonexistent as another winter storm dumped snow and ice across Montana, the Dakotas and Minnesota. Areas not affected by snow were hit by a seasonal lull ahead of Wednesday's Christmas holiday.

"We've got at least 30 or 40 inches on the ground," a Red River Valley dealer said. He added that Monday's storms had dropped an additional three to four inches of snow on top of last week's heavy accumulations.
"There's a lot of blowing snow but that's about it," one Minnesota dealer said. "It's so close to the holiday that no one is really doing anything anyway."
Price per bushel for 14-pct protein dark northern spring, durum and white wheats, in dollars per bushel:
Spring Chg Durum(m) Chg White Chg
Spring Chg HRW 13pct Chg White Chg
